ImAFirstGen: I am a first generation college student that graduated from the University of California, Irvine as a Software Engineer. I enjoy working on various projects, from game development to web development. At the moment, I am interested in working on front-end/back-end web projects.
uncoveredMyPassion: I uncovered my passion for coding in High School when I took a semester long computer science class. Although it was about moving code blocks to program, it piqued my curiosity when I finished a functional replica of the Mario game. I enjoy the process of building programs, from beginning to end because for me it's all about the experience and the new skills you learn along the way.
